mapper.select: SELECT EMPLOYEE.EMPNO, EMPLOYEE.EMPNM, EMPLOYEE.BIRTHDATE, EMPLOYEE.TELEPHONE, EMPLOYEE.ADDRESS FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPLOYEE.EMPNO = #{empNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE (EMPNO, EMPNM, BIRTHDATE, TELEPHONE, ADDRESS) VALUES (#{empNo}, #{empNm}, #{birthdate}, #{telephone}, #{address})
